description: Use to check if a device is registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

parameters.name: DeviceName
parameters.description: The unique name of the device you want to get the registration status from.

parameters.name: DeviceFleetName
parameters.description: The name of the fleet that the device belongs to.

nested_items.name: DeviceRegistration
nested_items.description: Describes if the device is currently registered with SageMaker Edge Manager.

nested_items.name: CacheTTL
nested_items.description: The amount of time, in seconds, that the registration status is stored on the device's cache before it is refreshed.
